item.title: Did the Golden State Warriors handle the Draymond Green situation well? | SPEAK
item.description: LeSean McCoy believes that Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr handled the Draymond Green, Jordan Poole physical altercation well. Even though Green did not receive a suspension McCoy goes on to explain that Green protects the Warriors with his presence and through this situation the Warriors may have the opportunity to make amends.

item.title: Matt Barnes rejected LeBron James and Dwyane Wade to play with Kobe Bryant | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Matt Barnes shares a story of him rejecting LeBron & D-Wade to play with Kobe on the Lakers. “I got a call from a number I didn’t know and it was him. He’s like, ‘It’s Kobe…You want to be a Laker?’ And I’m like, ‘Hell yeah!’”

item.title: Matt Barnes crowns Giannis Antetokounmpo as the NBA's Best Player | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Former NBA Champion Matt Barnes list his top 5 players in the NBA with a few surprises near the top. Giannis Antetokounmpo, Kevin Durant, LeBron James, Stephen Curry and Joel Embiid make the list. However 2x NBA MVP Nikola Jokic and this year's MVP favorite Luka Doncic are notably missing from Barnes' list. Barnes shares why he thinks Giannis is the best player in the world right now.

item.title: Matt Barnes: Kobe No. 24 was better than Kobe No. 8 | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Matt Barnes tells Shannon Sharpe that he would pick Kobe Bryant No. 24 over No. 8. “I would pick 24, just cause I think off the court he was so much more open as a person and had been thru so much.”

item.title: Will Draymond Green finish the season as a Warrior? | FIRST THINGS FIRST
item.description: Nick Wright gives his thoughts following the Breaking News that Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green will not receive a suspension from the team for his actions in the physical altercation with teammate Jordan Poole. Nick believes the Warriors do not want to extend Draymond into his later 30’s and this incident gives them an “out” in the future. Watch as Nick discusses possible trade candidates for Green and the Warriors.

item.title: Nick Wright speaks on Draymond Green's return to the Golden State Warriors | THE HERD
item.description: Nick Wright joins Colin Cowherd to speak on Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green’s return following the physical altercation with teammate Jordan Poole. Nick voices his opinions on the situation and looks forward to the implications the altercation will have on the Warriors as a team. Watch as Nick discusses the situation.

item.title: Should the Warriors have suspended Draymond Green?
item.description: Did Steve Kerr and the Golden State Warriors make the correct decision in not suspending Draymond Green? Skip and Shannon weigh in.

item.title: Draymond Green will be fined, not suspended for punching Jordan Poole | THE HERD
item.description: The Golden State Warriors announced that they will only fine and not suspend Draymond Green for punching Jordan Poole during practice. Head Coach Steve Kerr calls it the 'biggest crisis' they ever had since he coached the team. Colin Cowherd defends Green and reacts to the Warriors' decision.

item.title: Matt Barnes on Ime Udoka & Nia Long: "I thought was a smear campaign" | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Matt Barnes talks with Shannon Sharpe about how the Boston Celtics handled Ime Udoka’s suspension and why he at first came to Ime’s defense. “The way it came out it felt like a smear campaign, which is why I initially came to his defense.”

item.title: Matt Barnes on Shaq declining to comment on Ime Udoka, Celtics because he's a 'serial cheater' | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: NBA Champion Matt Barnes joins Shannon Sharpe on the CLUB SHAY SHAY podcast to discuss Shaquille O'Neal's stance to stay quiet when asked about the Boston Celtics decision to suspend head coach Ime Udoka.

item.title: Matt Barnes leaves KD, Iverson & Curry off his all-time starting 5 teammates lineup | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Shannon Sharpe asks Matt Barnes out of all his teammates, who would make his starting 5. Matt Barnes leaves off Kevin Durant, Allen Iverson & Steph Curry.

item.title: Matt Barnes: LeBron take a step back to allow Russ to be Russ | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Matt Barnes gives advice to the Los Angeles Lakers on how to make it work with Russell Westbrook, LeBron James and Anthony Davis. “If Bron can take a small step back to allow Russ to take a step forward, they can make it work.”

item.title: Matt Barnes retracts his criticism of LeBron James' leadership on the Lakers | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Matt Barnes takes back his comments on LeBron’s leadership and comparing him to Kobe & MJ. “Everyone leads different, and there’s no rulebook on how to lead. What makes LeBron great is he does things his way.”

item.title: Matt Barnes: "Warriors don't win any championships without Draymond Green" | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Former NBA Champion Matt Barnes visits Shannon Sharpe on the CLUB SHAY SHAY podcast to discuss Draymond Green's value to the Golden State Warriors. When asked about Draymond, Barnes said “When he makes it to the Hall of Fame, dudes are going to ask how…The stat sheet won’t tell the whole story. Draymond's a winner and the heart & soul of the Warriors and the city."

item.title: Draymond Green fined, not suspended for punching Warriors teammate | UNDISPUTED
item.description: Steve Kerr said Draymond Green will return to practice tomorrow and only be fined for punching Golden State Warriors teammate Jordan Poole. The Warriors open the regular season against LeBron James and the Los Angeles Lakers at Chase Center in San Francisco.

item.title: Draymond Green fined, not suspended; set to rejoin Warriors on Thursday
item.description: Golden State Warriors forward Draymond Green will be fined and not suspended for his altercation with teammate Jordan Poole.

item.title: Jordan Poole hasn't forgiven Warriors teammate Draymond Green | FIRST THINGS FIRST
item.description: There's a report that Golden State Warriors guard Jordan Poole has not spoken to his teammate Draymond Green since their punching incident during practice. Chris Broussard, Nick Wright, and Kevin Wildes react to the Warriors report.

item.title: Jeanie Buss confirms she 'pushed the button' on Lakers pairing LeBron & Anthony Davis | UNDISPUTED
item.description: Jeanie Buss gave insight into the Los Angeles Lakers decision to trade for Anthony Davis in 2019. In the Hulu series, Legacy, Buss said quote, "ultimately it was my decision to push the button." Shannon Sharpe and Skip Bayless talk LeBron James, Anthony Davis and the Lakers.

item.title: Bronny James, four others sign NIL deals with Nike
item.description: Bronny James, the eldest son of LeBron James, was one of five individuals to sign an NIL deal with Nike on Monday.

item.title: Luka Dončić, Giannis highlight Nick's way-too early NBA MVP bets | What's Wright?
item.description: The NBA is tipping off this month, but it is never too early to place a bet on this year's MVP! Luka Dončić is currently the favorite to win the league's MVP, but who should bettors put money on? Watch as Nick Wright answers a fan question by sharing some tips on betting the NBA's MVP, along with a ''semi-long shot' candidate who is looking to build his historical resumé this year.

item.title: Draymond Green stepping away from Warriors after punching Jordan Poole
item.description: Green took responsibility for his actions on Saturday but said he needs to regain the trust of his team, adding, "I failed as a leader."

item.title: Lamar's reaction to Charles Oakley punching his Clippers teammate, Jeff McInnis | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Lamar Odom recalls the story about Charles Oakley showing up to the Los Angeles Clippers practice and punched his teammate, Jeff McInnis. “He f***ed him up…Charles said, ‘LO, I told him I had punishment waiting for him.’”

item.title: Lamar Odom on playing for Pat Riley: "I thought my name was motherf***er" | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Lamar Odom tells Shannon what it was like playing for Pat Riley. “When I first started to play for Pat, I thought my name was “motherf***er…He breaks you down to build you back up. Players today couldn’t take Pat.”

item.title: Draymond punching Warriors teammate Jordan Poole video surfaces via TMZ | FIRST THINGS FIRST
item.description: Footage surfaces of Golden State Warriors F Draymond Green punching his Warriors teammate Jordan Poole during a practice. Chris Broussard, Nick Wright and Kevin Wildes react to the shocking footage.

item.title: Victor Wembanyama is the NBA's future, and resistance is futile
item.description: In two exhibition games on national TV, Victor Wembanyama lived up to the hype — and then some. And he might have changed the NBA in just one week.

item.title: Warriors once again grappling with the duality of Draymond Green
item.description: Draymond Green's superpower — his intensity — is also his greatest weakness. And punching teammate Jordan Poole was not the first time he crossed the line.

item.title: Lamar Odom on Kobe Bryant's reaction to Shaq winning an NBA Title with the Miami Heat | CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: Lamar Odom tells Shannon Sharpe what Kobe Bryant's reaction and mindset was after Shaquille O'Neal won a title with the Miami Heat. “That could’ve been our title too…Kobe said: ‘I’m going to get me one…I know I’m going to get me one."

item.title: Mark Cuban kicked Lamar Odom during a Mavericks game in the 2011-2012 NBA season| CLUB SHAY SHAY
item.description: 2x NBA Champion Lamar Odom details the incident Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban kicked him during a Mavs game during the 2011-2012 NBA season.

item.title: LeBron made it unequivocally clear the NBA will expand around his retirement | What's Wright?
item.description: LeBron James bounced back in the Los Angeles Lakers' preseason loss against the Phoenix Suns, scoring 23 points in 17 minutes. However, the main story is his postgame comments, when he addressed to Commissioner Adam Silver about owning an NBA team in Las Vegas. Nick Wright breaks down what LeBron's plea means for his post-playing days and the future of NBA expansion.

item.title: Draymond Green has to know better, Nick on the Jordan Poole dust-up | What's Wright?
item.description: Draymond Green is in hot water after reportedly losing his temper during practice and punching his teammate Jordan Poole. Nick Wright calls this behavior unacceptable, and lays out why Draymond, who's supposed to be a master communicator, has got to do better
